text: ==Seventh National Games== This stadium hosted the opening ceremony of seventh national games. It couldn't host the football matches of seventh national games because the stadium was not in proper condition. Covered Hall nearby it hosted some indoor games such as Table Tennis, Karate, etc. During seventh national game opening ceremony the stadium was made beautiful like Queen. ==sport== ==medal tebal== Category:Multi-sport events in Nepal Nepal Category:Sport in Nepal
title: Seventh National Games (Nepal)
